Package com.hexanome16.client.screens.game

Class UpdateGameInfo

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.client.screens.game.UpdateGameInfo
public class UpdateGameInfo extends Object
Class with a bunch of methods to update various game information.

  • Method Details

    • fetchPlayerBank

      public static void fetchPlayerBank(long sessionId, String playerName)
      In any other Context than Prompts, update game variables.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - unique session identifier.
      playerName - name of player whose bank will get updated.

    • fetchPlayerBank

      public static void fetchPlayerBank(long sessionId, String playerName, boolean withinPrompt)
      Fetch player bank and game bank from server and sets those to be visible from the UI, mainly used for prompt.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Unique session identifier.
      playerName - name of player.
      withinPrompt - True if call within prompt, (doesn't update same properties), false for any other context.

    • fetchGameBank

      public static void fetchGameBank(long sessionId)
      Fetch game bank for that session, modifies game WorldProperty.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - session identification.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public static void setCurrentPlayer(long sessionId, String currentPlayer)
      Updates Current player text at top right of screen.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - unique session identifier for the game.
      currentPlayer - username for player we would like to set as new current player.

    • toGemAmountMap

      public static Map<CurrencyType,Integer> toGemAmountMap(String bankPriceMapAsString)
      Transforms String of bank retrieved from server to a Map .
      Parameters:
      bankPriceMapAsString - String of bank
      Returns:
      Map mapping CurrencyType to amount of each currency type in bank

    • setPlayerBankInfoGlobal

      public static void setPlayerBankInfoGlobal(String playerName, Map<CurrencyType,Integer> playerInfo)
      Allows to set the bank information for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - username of player we're fetching the information for.
      playerInfo - Map between Currency type and the new amount of each currency

    • fetchAllPlayer

      public static void fetchAllPlayer(long sessionId, String[] usernames)
      Initialize all tokens for all players.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - unique session identifier.
      usernames - all players in the game.

    • initPlayerTurn

      public static void initPlayerTurn()
      To avoid null in that value when it is first asked for when it is bound.
